title: Travel Riddles 2: Trip To Italy [FINAL] (2015) (PC)
description:
Travel Riddles 2: Trip To Italy 

The Eternal City of Rome awaits you with riddles and challenging puzzles. Collect more than 80 artifacts on this awesome match-3 adventure while travelling to the most beautiful sights. Mighty power-ups will help you set the highest score.

Visit the miraculous fields of Tuscany, romantic channels of Venice, beautiful streets of ancient Milano and donâ€™t forget to have a cup of tea in the Sicilian cafe after leaving Vesuvius and Naples. Your journey around the world continues! Welcome to Italy!    84 artifacts to collect    Beautiful locations    7 episodes to complete
